attributes.action: introduce a specialised anti-corruption police unit in Scotland .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To introduce a specialised anti-corruption police unit within Scotland .That this anti-corruption police unit will  be totally independant of the Scottish police forces and have the powers to arrest anyone and to  be able to fully investigate any forms of corruption within the Scottish legal establishment even to the extent of having powers to investigate corruption at the highest level of authority like for instance Chief Constables , Procurator Fiscals , Judges  ETC . That they are not subjected to Red-Tape by the government or Official Secrets Act . That they are an anti-corruption unit along the lines of the F.B.I. and that they are properly funded by the UK government as there is currently no anti-corruption police unit in Scotland .

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
